resources.string: Welcome to Eat More! This app is designed to make it easier for people around the world to get suggestions of restaurants near them. Now, you may ask, how is this different from other apps? Well, the idea behind our design is to make the experience as simple as possible without detracting from user experience. In addition, it offers an alarm system that is not seen in any other suggestion-based app.

Imagine you have a business meeting in two days. You don\'t know the area very well and there is way too much on your mind for you to be thinking about lunch that day. Well, our alarm system allows for users to set a specific time and day that they want to receive a restaurant suggestion. When this time comes, the user receives a notification with an option to view nearby places.

If not selected from the notification menu, the user may also choose to view nearby places from inside the app. They appear as a list where each item may be selected to view detailed information. There is also an option to view these places on a map to see where they are in relation to you.
